Reviews.Title: Very good buy
Reviews.Author: radaray
Reviews.Content: Very basic, easy to use camera. Share feature and operating manual both suck, but I have no need for the share feature, and the camera is so easy to use, one doesn't need much in the way of instruction. Short battery life has been mentioned previously, but I have not found that yet. This camera uses two (2) AA alkaline cells as opposed to some that use four, so I don't consider that a negative. For the price, this camera will do everything you need in a point and shoot unit. Picture quality is great! I had a Canon that crashed that cost a lot more, that was much more difficult to use, and did not produce the quality this unit gives. So much for the big names and big price tags! This is the second item I've purchased from Amazon, and have been pleased with both.

Reviews.Title: Lens distortion on left side
Reviews.Author: Headhunter 6
Reviews.Content: My other Kodak digital cameras have been great. This one, however, is the worst digital camera ever. Mine has very noticeable blurring on the far left 1/4 of my images, due to a lens defect of some form. It is there in all images under all lighting conditions and in all modes. Didn't discover it till about a week after I bought it--well after I had thrown out the box and other packing materials (darn!). It is especially noticeable in distance shots of scenery. And once I discovered it, I went back to look at my other photos--family and indoor shots--and noticed it there too. I guess I could crop the left 1/4 of every shot and it would be ok, but what I really want in a camera without an obvious defect.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Manga1
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my mom and she loves it its easy to use not too heavy for her and takes great pictures it also has a share button on it you can hook it up with wiifii or usb and share your pics with Facebook etc...nice camera as always Kodak knows Cameras.

Reviews.Title: Seller's fault
Reviews.Author: DAVEO
Reviews.Content: bought it as a fixed product...usually I get a product that is working...this company watch out for...Price not worth it

Reviews.Title: It died....
Reviews.Author: Marianne Allen
Reviews.Content: The Kodak C182 and C183 are my absolute favorite cameras because the shutter speed and clarity of the photos but they die quickly and as long as I can purchase one, I will.  I gave it 3 stars because it's a great camera but it don't last long.  However, I use my camera to take up to 2,000 photos a day so that may be another reason it did not last.

Reviews.Title: it okay
Reviews.Author: woody
Reviews.Content: the camera work fine expect for the sticky note post on my len of my camera was too hard to clean off the dust line

Reviews.Title: Bought as a gift
Reviews.Author: Zin Armagadan
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my mother. She never had a digital camera before and felt this would be perfect for her. Since I got it used, there were some use marks, most notably on the screen. I had also bought a 16GB SD Card to go with it, so she may never fill it up.

Reviews.Title: Great replacement
Reviews.Author: Jodi
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to replace my other one that got dropped too many times. It's easy to work with and simple to use. thsi one was in perfect shape.

Reviews.Title: My Elderly Mom loves it!
Reviews.Author: Agent 372
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift for my (not technically inclined) Elderly (82yrs old) Mom...she loves it!  She has no problem with operating it, which was a bit of a surprise for me, as she has trouble with a cell phone.  The 14MP image is great!  I have been borrowing it to take pix for Facebook and my Blog!  Matter of fact, I am gonna get ME one now!

Reviews.Title: Kodak Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Mincks 2
Reviews.Content: This camera works GREAT!  It was in perfect condition.  The only reason I rated it four stars rather than five was because I purchased it for a gift.  I paid $10 extra to get it in a box so it wouldn't be so obvious it was used, and the box was so broken and had tape pulled off in multiple areas, that it made it look WORSE.  So--I wasted my $10.  But the camera was in perfect condition, and my great grandson loves it.

Reviews.Title: kodak easyshare camera c183 14 mp digital camera w/3x optical 3.0 inch
Reviews.Author: marjoriehope
Reviews.Content: a very nice camera, but it came without a manual, I just hope that I can manage to operate it with no problem, it takes wonderful pictures! thank you amazon!!!

Reviews.Title: I was told the refurbished camera had scratches....that's the least of this camera's problem
Reviews.Author: azure
Reviews.Content: I was told there were scratches on the screen...that's the least of the problem. The lens only opens half way most of the time so I can forget about taking a quick pic because I have to push it open with my finger. Yet the most annoying problem is the zoom button doesn't work, at all.

Reviews.Title: Very good buy.
Reviews.Author: Samuel D. Pagan "Sam P."
Reviews.Content: The person I bought it for was very happy with it so thank's for making my dad day. Hope to get something from in the future. See you latter.

Reviews.Title: My previous point & shoot Kodak camera was better
Reviews.Author: D. Wilmoth
Reviews.Content: The image quality is decent when the photos turn out but the Smart Capture mode is INFURIATING and I'd say about 85% of the time it is automatically falsely "detecting" that it needs to be in macro mode and therefore indoor shots often turn out blurry or out of focus because I'm constantly fighting it to exit macro mode.There aren't as many "scenes" options to chose from either, so often I'm flummoxed as to where to set it to avoid using Smart Capture. My last Kodak camera was much better, but my niece pulled it out of my hand, it bounced off the floor, and the plastic surrounding the lens broke so I had to replace it. This one seems to be fully functional except the issues I'm having with focus and Smart Capture. As soon as I can afford to, I'm going to replace it so that I'm able to get more in-focus, un-blurry shots.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: 45th_Johnny
Reviews.Content: It is the best camera I have found, for the price.  14mp, easy to use, great pictures, nice to look at and fits in your pocket.  Thank you Amazon, but you should change your name to Amazing.  More then half my online shopping is done here.

Reviews.Title: Cannot take a good picture with this camera
Reviews.Author: Shelley
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my son, but I use it as a back up to mine as well.  It cannot take a good picture.  They all seem to be blurry.  What a waste.  My iPhone takes better pictures.

Reviews.Title: Bring extra batteries
Reviews.Author: Mr. Sivertson
Reviews.Content: This camera takes very nice pictures for the price you pay, but you would be hard pressed to find a device that goes through batteries faster.

Reviews.Title: Terrible firearm.
Reviews.Author: sbamkmfdmdfmk
Reviews.Content: I tried taking this with me on a hunting trip. Got up in a treehouse perch and after two hours, what looked like a 12-point whitetail showed up and was lingering for a while. I pulled out my C183 and had a clear shot to its kill zone. Hit the trigger and the darn thing let out a muzzle flash so bright, it got the deer's attention and she sprinted away before I had a chance to reload!Pros: Very quiet shotCons: Doesn't shoot bullets

Reviews.Title: BEST kodak camera!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: bacho
Reviews.Content: VERY GOOD SET FOR DIGITAL CAMERA kodak I AM VERY VERY happy with his work,BEST digital camera, GOOD AMAZON! THANK YOU FOR IT WHAT existS  AMAZON! thanks!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Make Mine Kodak...
Reviews.Author: Winston Blakely
Reviews.Content: Kodak EasyShare C183 14MP Digital Camera w/ 3x Optical Zoom, 3.0 inch LCD (Black) How can you not love the Kodak Easyshare Series of Point and Shoot Cameras? All of them do exactly what you want... Take Good Pictures! I highly recommend all of the products in Kodak's list of affordable cameras. Easy to use and most come with a great user manual. There's always a slot for memory cards for storage, which helps when you want to transfer them to another device for printing.  So make mine Kodak... and keep them coming,too... with all the wonderful  updated features and so forth...

ProductInfo.Features:
One-button upload to email, Kodak Gallery, Youtube?, Facebook and Flickr sites
Better pictures automatically with Kodak Smart Capture technology
Find photos easily with face recognition technology
14MP, 3x zoom and 3" bright LCD
Advanced video features
ProductInfo.Name: Kodak EasyShare C183 14MP Digital Camera w/ 3x Optical Zoom, 3.0 inch LCD (Black)
